questions.question: This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This arc takes place on a floating island and involves the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a despotic ruler with the power of light. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
Rarely seen and highly respected, this form of Haki allows its user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Big Mom Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate candy. What is...?
This ability, used by a Straw Hat crew member, allows them to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled cook and martial artist, known for his kicks and dream of finding the All Blue. Who is...?
